com.isotrol.impe3.api.component
Interface BinaryRenderer

All Superinterfaces:
ComponentRenderer
All Known Subinterfaces:
ExcelRenderer, PDFRenderer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBinaryRenderer, FopRenderer, POIExcelRenderer
public interface BinaryRenderer
extends ComponentRenderer

Interface defining a binary renderer.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

Method Summary
 String getFileName()
          Returns the suggested file name, if the response is an attachment.
 Integer getLength()
          Returns the content length, if known.
 javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType getMediaType()
          Returns the media type of the response.
 void prepare()
          First method called by the rendering engine.
 void write(OutputStream os)
          Writes the response.
 

Method Detail

prepare

void prepare()
First method called by the rendering engine. Use to prepare the return arguments for the other methods or to precompute the response. If the method throws any exception further processing will be interrupted and server error will be sent to the client.

getMediaType

javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType getMediaType()
Returns the media type of the response. It MUST be non-null.

Returns:
The media type of the response.

getLength

Integer getLength()
Returns the content length, if known.

Returns:
The content length or null if not known.

getFileName

String getFileName()
Returns the suggested file name, if the response is an attachment.

Returns:
The file name for an attachment, null for an inline disposition.

write

void write(OutputStream os)
           throws IOException
Writes the response.

Parameters:
os - Output stream.
Throws:
IOException - If an error occurs.
